review: I bought this product expecting great things-put in my first strawberry and squeezed the handle---small red bits of the plastic flew off onto the counter and it was broken....tried one more strawberry but again,small red bits of plastic broke off and the blades no longer will stay in place;  super disappointed that it was not made well enough to do what it advertised.
productTitle: Chef'n Strawberry Slicester Hand-Held Strawberry Slicer
